name: Ixia Network Packet Broker
description: This ixia NPB App supports a variety of actions on network packet broker platform. This App has been tested with Vision One

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration parameters
List the users currently available on the instance
List the sessions currently available on the Monitoring node
Remove a filter from the instance
Update the mode of a filter
Update the operator of a filter
Update the mac address criteria for a filter

source_mac.description: Source MAC addresses to be added

destination_mac.description: Destination MAC addresses to be added

source_or_destination_mac.description: Source or Destination IP addresses to be added

overwrite.description: Overwrites all the MAC related rules in the filter with the specified rule in the action run

actions.description: Update the port critera of a filter

source_port.description: Source IP addresses to be added

destination_port.description: Destination IP addresses to be added

source_or_destination_port.description: Source or Destination IP addresses to be added

overwrite.description: Overwrites all the port related rules in the filter with the specified rule in the action run

actions.description: Update the IP address criteria of a filter

source_ip.description: Source IP addresses to be added

destination_ip.description: Destination IP addresses to be added

source_or_destination_ip.description: Source or Destination IP addresses to be added

overwrite.description: Overwrites all the IP related rules in the filter with the specified rule in the action run

actions.description: Updates the vlan replacement settings of a filter
Creates a new filter on the instance
Fetch a list of the filters from the instance
Fetches the details of a specified filter

actions.verbose: This action safely restarts an NTO, a union or a member
